data.name: Puzzle Quest 3 – Golden Flame Gear Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Get an exclusive bundle of gear to help kickstart your adventure! Equip the Serpentine Flame Ring to gain the power of haste when you match eight or more gems and the Jeweled Golden Grasp Gauntlet to deal extra damage to stunned opponents. This bundle also includes resources to upgrade your new gear!

The Golden Flame Gear Bundle Includes:

  • 1 Epic Accessory (Serpentine Flame Ring)
  • 1 Rare Armor (Jeweled Golden Grasp)
  • 300 Lesser Accessory Shards
  • 300 Lesser Armor Shards
  • 5000 Gold

Please note: The contents of this DLC bundle are not tradeable or refundable.

data.short_description: Get an exclusive bundle of gear to help kickstart your adventure in Puzzle Quest 3!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On board
